ultrahardcoremod.config.title: Ultra Hard Coremod Config
commands.uhc.respawn.failure: Could not respawn %s player(s) to team %s: %s
commands.uhc.forceteam.failure: Could not force team of %s because %s is not online.
commands.uhc.spawnroom.success: UHC Spawn room has been placed.
commands.uhc.spawnroom.success1: UHC Spawn room has been removed.
book.uhc.team.randomized: %s has been put in team %s randomly.
book.uhc.team.maxed: Can not join team %s, team has max amount of players.
book.uhc.team.antispam: Please wait a few seconds before changing team.
book.uhc.team.locked: You can not change teams, teams have been locked.
book.uhc.shrink.control: %s is at the control point. Shrinking the border by 1 block every second.
book.uhc.explain.timelock: When enabled time will lock to the specified.
book.uhc.explain.minmark: When enabled mode Every specified amount of
book.uhc.explain.minmark2: minutes a message will display in chat.
book.uhc.explain.timename: When enabled Enemy names will be
book.uhc.explain.timename2: hidden for x amount of minutes.
book.uhc.explain.timeglow: When enabled Players will glow after
book.uhc.explain.nether: When disabled players can't travel to the nether.
book.uhc.explain.regenpotion: When disabled Ghast tears will convert to gold ingots
book.uhc.explain.regenpotion2: preventing the brewing of regeneration potions.
book.uhc.explain.level2potion: When disabled Glowstone dust will convert to
book.uhc.explain.level2potion2: Glowstone preventing the brewing of level 2 potions.
book.uhc.explain.notchapple: When disabled Notch apples will convert
book.uhc.explain.autocook4: New smelting can be added with CraftTweaker.
book.uhc.explain.itemconvert: When enabled will do nothing unless
book.uhc.explain.itemconvert5: Given items will convert to given materials.
book.uhc.explain.weather: When disabled doWeatherCycle will be disabled.
book.uhc.explain.mobgriefing: When disabled mobGriefing will be disabled.
book.uhc.explain.customhealth: When enabled custom max health can be set here.
book.uhc.explain.randomspawns2: When disabled it uses the spawns from config.
book.uhc.explain.spreadrange: The range in which it teleports players.
book.uhc.explain.spreadteams: When enabled it teleports teams together.
book.uhc.explain.graceperiod: When enabled the specified amount of minutes players
book.uhc.explain.graceperiod2: won't be able to fight eachother.
uhc.player.won: %s§6 has won the UHC on their own!§r
